attributes.action: Ensure all England Football matches are shown live on terrestrial TV.
attributes.additional_details: We pay the BBC our TV licence fee and the ITV stations receive monies from advertising that the public have no choice in their selection so together with the government all Senior Men's & Women's National games should be transmitted live for all to see.
attributes.background:
Football in our National Game we should not be forced to pay to subscription TV stations to be able to watch live games.
The majority of the public have supported the England FA but are then excluded from watching them unless we pay a subscription.
All Senior games should be on BBC or ITV
